html:
For a very limited time, Amazon has a flash sale with the SAMSUNG T5 EVO Portable SSD 8TB for only $399.

SAMSUNG T5 EVO Portable SSD 8TB

  • 8TB Storage Capacity
  • USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 Interface (5 Gb/s)
  • Up to 460 MB/s Data Transfer Rate
  • AES 256-Bit Hardware Encryption
  • Rubber Skin Design
  • Integrated Hook

Featuring an integrated hook and a rubber skin design, the Samsung 8TB T5 EVO USB 3.2 Gen 1 Portable SSD is easy to transport, so you can take your files with you while on the go. The rubber skin provides an anti-scratch and anti-slip design while the integrated hook allows you to connect the T5 EVO to your bag with a carabiner.

With 8TB of storage, a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port (5 Gb/s), and up to a 460 MB/s data transfer rate, the T5 EVO can store and transfer your files quickly and efficiently. It also has 256-bit AES encryption to keep your files safe and secure. Check the drive’s health and get firmware updates through the Samsung Magician software.

Performance Up to 3.8x faster transfer speed than an external hard drive (460 MB/s)Up to 2x faster sustained performance than a SATA-based portable SSD

Capacity & Design 8TB capacity with a palm-sized form factorHook design for easy carrying

Reliability Up to 6.6′ drop resistanceRubber skin for anti-scratch and anti-slipDrive health check and firmware update through Samsung Magician software

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
